patthana8.18:4.1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:4.2: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:4.3: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.18:5.1: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:5.2: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:5.3: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.18:6.1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:6.2: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:6.3: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
